interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Too Faced Gingerbread Extra Spicy Eyeshadow Palette
Review Date: 2020/12/27
Store: Too Faced
Product Description: ['Includes 18 multi-finish warm and toasty shadows that glide on with buttery smoothness for playful pops of color that smell like fresh-baked gingerbread.']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Sheer', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.75 x 4.02 x 0.94 inches; 8.32 Ounces', 'UPC': '651986907939'}
Review Text: This is the most used palette in my makeup wardrobe. I usually use it for a professional everyday look for work. However , it is versatile enough that I can intensify it for evening or dressy occasions or tone it down for subtly enhancing a "no makeup" look. Because it is neutral and universally flattering on almost all skin tones (may not show up well if you have a deep toned complexion), I can wear it with any color in my wardrobe. I also like that it has a fantastic cool toned set of colors that do not end up showing up blue or purple on the skin. The undertones are very subtle, just like real skin! So hard to find - there seems to be a profusion of warm toned makeup out there, but very little cool or neutral toned makeup that produces a smooth, natural looking and flattering gradient of color on the skin. Nice job, Too Faced! I hope you regard this as your flagship palette and never discontinue this. Don't change the formula either!
Review Title: TOO FACED DEVOTEE
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Tone Preference:** The user identifies as very fair-skinned and seeks cosmetic products that enhance their complexion without appearing artificial or overly bronzed.
- **Product Type:** Preference for powder formulations, particularly bronzers with light coverage and matte finishes. The user also embraces cream formulations for specific uses, such as color correction and versatile eyeshadow palettes.
- **Brand Loyalty:** While exhibiting a strong preference for Benefit Cosmetics, the user has expanded their brand interests to include luxury brands like Charlotte Tilbury and Iles Formula, along with an appreciation for Too Faced, demonstrating a willingness to explore high-quality products.
- **Desired Effects:** Values natural, healthy glow and skincare benefits, focusing on understated beauty looks while appreciating products that provide a refined finish. The user enjoys versatile palettes suitable for both professional and casual looks.
- **Purchase Behavior:** Demonstrates a tendency to stock up on preferred items but is also open to trying new products, reflecting a strategic approach to beauty purchases. The user appreciates neutral and universally flattering shades that can be adapted for various occasions.
- **Review Style:** Communicates enthusiasm and satisfaction in reviews, frequently awarding high ratings. The user highlights the importance of subtle undertones that align with a natural look, expressing strong satisfaction with the performance of both makeup and hair care products.

Overall, the user prioritizes natural-looking makeup suitable for fair skin while being open to experimenting with new luxury products that align with their preferences for quality and effectiveness in beauty and hair care.
